summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 727 m), feels like temperature (up 1.6°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 772.4m higher than yesterday, 136.0m lower than the past week, 727.3m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 765m to 2220m and averaged 2040m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, a muggy, humid atmosphere is likely. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
